app.title: Claude Code Permission Manager
app.description: Manage permissions and settings for Claude Code

modes.title: Permission Modes
modes.description: Configure permissions for each mode. Claude Code has three operation modes with different permission levels.
modes.planDesc: When Claude is planning or exploring the codebase

permissions.readDesc: Read files in the current directory
permissions.readAllFilesDesc: Read files outside the current directory
permissions.editDesc: Edit files in the current directory
permissions.editAllFilesDesc: Edit files outside the current directory
permissions.riskyDesc: Execute risky commands in the current directory
permissions.riskyAllFilesDesc: Execute risky commands outside the current directory

categories.title: Tool & Command Categories
categories.description: Define which tools and commands belong to each permission category.
categories.enterToolsPlaceholder:
One tool per line, e.g.:
Read
Write
Edit
categories.enterCommandsPlaceholder:
One command per line, e.g.:
cat *
ls *
git status

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Configure notification settings for Claude Code events.
notifications.onCompletionDesc: Notify when a task is completed
notifications.soundPreviewDesc: Click on a sound name to preview it, choose your preferred notification sound

messages.confirmDiscard: Are you sure you want to discard changes?
messages.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset to defaults?

hooks.title: Hooks Installation
hooks.description: Install permission system to the .claude folder in current workspace
hooks.explanation: Hooks check permissions before Claude Code executes any tool. Once installed, projects in this directory will be protected by the permission system.
hooks.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall hooks? This will remove the hooks configuration from settings.json.

workspace.confirmSwitchTo: Are you sure you want to switch to {{path}}? Configuration will be reloaded.
workspace.confirmSwitchToGlobal: Are you sure you want to switch back to home directory (~/.claude)? Configuration will be reloaded.
